polimi.reds.broker.overlay
Interface PacketListener

All Known Subinterfaces:
Router
All Known Implementing Classes:
DeferredUnsubscriptionReconfigurator, GenericRouter, InformedLinkActivationReconfigurator
public interface PacketListener

Components implementing this interface may listen for the arrival of new packets (i.e., any Serializable object) through some Overlay.

See Also:
Overlay

Method Summary
 void notifyPacketArrived(java.lang.String subject, NodeDescriptor source, java.io.Serializable packet)
          This method is called by the Overlay whenever a new packet arrives from a neighbor of the local node.
 

Method Detail

notifyPacketArrived

void notifyPacketArrived(java.lang.String subject,
                         NodeDescriptor source,
                         java.io.Serializable packet)
This method is called by the Overlay whenever a new packet arrives from a neighbor of the local node.

Parameters:
subject - the subject the packet was addressed to.
source - the NodeDescriptor of the neighbor the packet comes from.
data - the received packet.
